task.title: Add a correlation filter
task.shortdesc: Steps that describe how to add a correlation filter.

context.p: Certain reports let you add custom correlation filters. For example, if you are viewing the Pages Report for a report suite that has Site Sections correlated with a Women's page, you can create a filter rule that generates a report showing the most popular pages when Site Sections = Women.
You can filter the data shown in a correlation report using any available correlation. The example here shows how you add a search engine correlation filter.

step.cmd: Run a report that supports correlations. (See .)
In the report header, click the Correlation Filter link.
Under Filter Rule Creator, select a category to correlate with an item.
